name: Hop! 2D (beta 6)
description:
HOP!2D beta 6

Hop is constantly jumping. Help him to rescue his girlfriend.

Briefly press LEFT or RIGHT arrow key to move him. By holding down an arrow key, Hop can gain momentum to jump further. He can also change direction while jumping.

This project is a playable beta version, limited to first worlds (but going on !).

Good luck and feel free to bring me some feedback !
